I love that you're able to catch these things, Frank. I can hear the messag=
e clearly, but I'll tell you right now that I would have missed it over and=
 over again during the review. 
=C2=A0
Between you & Hultay, it's inspiring=
 to=C2=A0see=C2=A0that one is able to attain this level and proficiency=C2=
=A0of "hearing" when it comes=C2=A0to GB communication (with lots of hard w=
ork and thousands of hours of listening, no doubt). 
=C2=A0
It gives me som=
ething to look forward to and keep working towards. 
=C2=A0
Thanks for shar=
ing!
=C2=A0
-JF
=C2=A0
=C2=A0
=C2=A0
=C2=A0

d below] 

=C2=A0This will be hard to hear, it's not made of the usual bits=
 of words, just mostly out of noise. I can use/do anything else, but tobacc=
o is absolutely forbidden. This was a result of thinking last night that as=
 much second hand smoke as I have to endure, I might as well smoke.
=C2=A0
=
F-S
